actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to limit the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to make deductions from proceeds of sale of milk marketed commercially by producers in certain insular areas.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to exclude Puerto Rico, Hawaii, the Northern Mariana Islands, and the territories of the United States from certain milk producer assessments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to limit the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to make deductions from proceeds of sale of milk marketed commercially by producers in certain insular areas.
